item.description:
Join Main Street Art as they host Julie Ann Holcombe, an outstanding artist who digitally manipulates contemporary photographic images to create unusual compositions that evoke meaningful symbolic references to art, philosophy, religion and history that culminate in a provocative and thoughtful artistic experience for the viewer.

Main Street Art is a relatively new gallery in bustling downtown Newfields. Those who attended the Fall 2011 opening by a small group of our group's artists will be familiar with this delightful local gallery. Those who are interested in participating in this coming Fall's exhibit by our group at this gallery will get to see and experience the space first-hand.

If you miss this opening, the gallery is open Saturdays through February 18th from noon to 3PM. For more information, visit the Main Street Art website.
item.name: Main Street Art Exhibition Opening: Sacred Ruins
